Claim: "People are doing things on the street."
Implication: "People are going about their business at the corner of 5th Avenue and W 58th streets."
Referring expressions: People, street  People, their business, 5th Avenue, W 58th streets.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsDoingThings(a) and IsOnTheStreet(b))) & (forall f ( IsDoingThings(f) ->  IsGoingAboutTheirBusiness(f))) & (forall g ( IsGoingAboutTheirBusiness(g) ->  IsDoingThings(g)))) -> (exists e (exists d (exists a (IsAt(d,e) and IsGoingAboutTheirBusiness(a)))))
